summary:
Ciceria
She is a harlequin and assassin.

When I create her, I just image if Cicero got sex change how would that be.
So this character I kinda like create her just for fun, then I make her into follower.

Height 0.95 Weight 0
Location: Falkreath Dead Man's Drink
Default Outfit: Jester's Cloth
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/8cXhgSV.jpg]</div><br/><div style=[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YV6we2A.jpg[/img][youtube]p9AuoGk60s0[/youtube]
[color=#ffa07a][b]Thank to Slytra review video !! [/b][/color][/center]

Hello! My name is [b]YuiH[/b](spell Yui "H", single H), I am from Taiwan.
So I can only speak a little English, sorry for my poor English

This is my second time to publish mod.

*This mod is stand-alone follower,so you don't need other mods to make her face like my image.*

Show me some screenshot with her in your game, I will very very appreciate.

I already to make the face painting not too much, not to wild.
I won't provided "no face painting version", because that is how I want her kept like that,
but you can replace by yourself.

[color=#ff6666][size=5][b][Character][/b][/size][/color]
[size=4][color=#ff0000][b]Ciceria[/b][/color][/size]
She is a harlequin and assassin.

When I create her, I just image if Cicero got sex change how would that be.
So this character I kinda like create her just for fun, then I make her into follower.

Height 0.95 Weight 0
Location: Falkreath Dead Man's Drink
Default Outfit: Jester's Clothes
Weapon: Ciceria's Special Steel Dagger
Combat style: 1H combat warrior
Perk: Armsman, Critical Charge, Fighting Stance, Agile Defender, Deft Movement, Stealth, Light Foot, Silence

Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only
And author of the original creator of the original Mod by Ren, apachii, NewSeaSims, Nani0427

[color=#ff6666][size=5][b][Change log][/b][/size][/color]
2014.04.19 - Release.
2014.04.21 - v0.2 Fix her Factions. Fix some English.
2014.05.05 - v0.3 Unlock her weapon, now allow change her weapon.
2014.10.02 - ver1.0 (Renewal) 
Change character's facial design, Change textures, fix head size
Change some status, change height from 0.96 to 0.95,
fix some minor problem. Change PC Level Mult from 1.2 to 1.0
2014.10.03 - ver1.1 (Renewal) Change character's facial design, give more smile.
